    21-30Make a sudden and brutal attack
    31-40Control or influence lesser creatures
    41-50Create confusion or strife
    51-60Leave foreboding signs
    61-70Lure the unwary
    71-80Imperil an event
    81-90Assert control over a location
    91-100Threaten resources
    Threat: Ravaging Horde
    1-10Overrun defenses
    11-20Gather resources
    21-30Attack a location
    31-40Expand forces
    41-50Appoint or reveal a leader
    51-60Send forth a champion
    61-70Create a diversion
    71-80Undermine an opposing force from within
    81-90Cut off supplies or reinforcements
    91-100Employ a new weapon
    Threat: Scheming Leader
    1-10Defeat an enemy
    11-20Form a new alliance
    21-30Usurp or undermine another leader
    31-40Force the loyalty of a community or important person
    41-50Enact a new law or tradition
    51-60Rescind an old law or tradition
    61-70Reveal a true intention
    71-80Unravel an existing alliance
    81-90Incite conflict
    91-100Use an unexpected capability or asset
    Threat: Power-Hungry Mystic
    1-10Gain hidden knowledge
    11-20Assault an enemy with magic
    21-30Despoil a place through magic
    31-40Forge a bond with ancient forces
    41-50Create magical wards or protections
    51-60Obtain a powerful artifact
    61-70Tempt with power or secrets
    71-80Recruit a follower or ally
    81-90Sacrifice something in exchange for greater power
    91-100Use magic to trick or deceive
    Threat: Zealous Cult
    1-10Overtake a faction or community
    11-20Unlock secrets to greater power
    21-30Establish false credibility
    31-40Appoint or reveal a leader
    41-50Lure new members or establish alliances
    51-60Subvert opposition through devious schemes
    61-70Attack opposition directly
    71-80Spread the word of its doctrine
    81-90Reveal a dire prophecy
    91-100Reveal its true nature or goal

     SITES 

    Site Name:

    Objective:

    Theme:

    Domain:

     DENIZENS 

    Very Common 01-27

    Common 28-41

    Common 42-55

    Common 56-69

    Uncommon 70-75

    Uncommon 76-81

    Uncommon 82-87

    Uncommon 88-93

    Rare 94-95

    Rare 96-97

    Rare 98-99

    Unforeseen 100

    When the outcome of a move prompts an encounter with a denizen, you may:

    >

    Choose or introduce a denizen based on the situation and what you know of this place.

    or

    Roll on the matrix to generate a random encounter. If the field is blank, add a new denizen.

    or

    Identify a denizen as likely to appear, and Ask the Oracle. If the answer is no, roll on the matrix.

    or

    Pick two denizens, rate one as likely, and Ask the Oracle to determine which you encounter.

     NOTES 

    Theme

    This place holds the secrets of a bygone age.

    Features

    1-4Evidence of lost knowledge
    5-8Inscrutable relics
    9-12Ancient artistry or craft
    13-16Preserved corpses or fossils
    17-20Visions of this place in another time

    Dangers

    1-5Ancient trap
    6-10Hazardous architecture or terrain
    11-12Blocked or broken path
    13-14Denizen protects an ancient secret
    15-16Denizen reveres an ancient power
    17-18Living relics of a lost age
    19-20Ancient evil resurgent
    21-22Dire warnings of a long-buried danger
    23-24Ancient disease or contamination
    25-26Artifact of terrible meaning or power
    27-28Disturbing evidence of ancient wrongs
    29-30Others seek power or knowledge

    This place is tainted by dark magic.

    Features

    1-4Mystic focus or conduit
    5-8Strange environmental disturbances
    9-12Mystic runes or markings
    13-16Blight or decay
    17-20Evidence of a foul ritual

    29-30Dread harbingers of a greater magic

    {{#custom-oracle}}
    {{custom-oracle}}
    {{/custom-oracle}} {{#revealADangerCategory}}
    {{revealADangerCategory}}
    {{#rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 1 25}} Worsening of the Situation {{/rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 1 25}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 26 60}} Unfavorable Road {{/rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 26 60}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 61 100}} Hostile Character Encounter {{/rollBetween() revealADangerCategory 61 100}}
    {{/revealADangerCategory}} {{#revealADangerSituation}}
    {{revealADangerSituation}}
    {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 1 13}} A portion of an edible resource got spoiled or lost. Suffer -1 supply. If your supply is 0, reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 1 13}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 14 24}} The travel is taking longer than expected. Suffer -1 momentum. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 14 24}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 25 34}} The trip was tough and left you tired. Endure Harm (1d4P harm). {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 25 34}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 35 42}} The travel has drained your energies. Endure Harm (1d4P harm) and take the weakened (severity +1) condition. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 35 42}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 43 50}} The travel has left you stressed or mentally fatigued. Endure Stress (1d2 stress). {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 43 50}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 51 57}} A friend or companion starts arguing for previous acts or complaining about the rough travel. Suffer -1d3 to their loyalty. If you don't have a companion, reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 51 57}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 58 64}} You realize you lost some valuable goods on the way. Suffer -2 wealth. If your wealth is reduced to 0, suffer -momentum to any remaining -wealth. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 58 64}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 65 71}} You realize too late that the supply container is broken and has a leak. Suffer -2 supply. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 65 71}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 72 77}} You realize you lost one of your valuable items on the way. Suffer -1 wealth. If your wealth is 0, reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 72 77}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 78 83}} You realize that one of the items you thought to be valuable, is actually not, or not worthy in its current state. Suffer -1 wealth and -1 momentum. If your wealth is an its minimum (0), reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 78 83}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 84 89}} You make a discovery that complicates one of your quests. Suffer -2 momentum. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 84 89}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 90 94}} A piece of equipment loses durability. Reduce any of your armors or shields values by 1. If you have no armor or shield item, reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 90 94}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 95 97}} You start suffering from muscle cramp, sprain or strain. Endure Harm (1d4P harm) and take the palsied (severity 1) condition. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 95 97}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 98 99}} You realize that one of your conditional companions is no longer by your side. Suffer -1 momentum. If you don't have a conditional companion, reroll on this table. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerSituation 98 99}} {{#rollTotal() revealADangerSituation 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, double its effect. {{/rollTotal() revealADangerSituation 100}}
    {{/revealADangerSituation}} {{#revealADangerRoad}}
    {{revealADangerRoad}}
    {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 1 13}} The terrain or the weather plays against you, hindering you. Subtract -1 to your next move. Take the hyperthermic or hypothermic condition if appropriate. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 1 13}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 14 25}} An environmental hazard forces you to pass through this area in a precarious manner. If you make a move to resolve this danger, subtract -1. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 14 25}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 26 35}} Whether it is human made or a fortuity of nature, you, or someone with you, is victim of a trap. If you make a move of resolve this danger, subtract -1. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 26 35}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 36 44}} You suffer some bruises on the way. Endure Harm (1d4 harm). {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 36 44}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 45 52}} You consumed some resources, and this road lacks sources to replenish from. Suffer -1 supply. If you Resupply, count a strong hit as a weak hit, and a weak hit as a miss. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 45 52}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 53 60}} The travel has been mentally grueling. Endure Stress (1 stress). If you Hearten, count a strong hit as a weak hit, and a weak hit as a miss. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 53 60}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 61 68}} You have not reached your waypoint yet, and this stop is too precarious to rest safely. If you Make Camp, count a strong hit as a weak hit, and a weak hit as a miss. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 61 68}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 69 75}} The path is broken and there doesn't seem to be a lead to follow it. Subtract -1 next time you Undertake a Journey for this travel. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 69 75}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 76 81}} An obstacle is blocking the path you intend to follow. Subtract -1 for your next move to resolve the obstacle or suffer -2 momentum causing a delay on your travel. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 76 81}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 82 86}} The path has a disturbing ambience or you find the horrible fate of a victim of this place. Endure Stress (1d4 stress). {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 82 86}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 87 90}} The environment undermines the path or the weather is disorienting, and you find difficult to recognize the track. Subtract -2 next time you Undertake a Journey for this travel. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 87 90}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 91 94}} Whether it was something you ate or something in the surroundings, you are now ill. Endure Harm (1d4P harm) and take the poisoned (severity +1) condition. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 91 94}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 95 97}} Whether it was something you ate or something in the surroundings, you got poisoned. Take the poisoned (severity +2) condition. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 95 97}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 98 99}} You realized you have been following the wrong path, and trickery leads have left you astray. Clear 1d2 progress boxes in the journey track. Next time you Undertake a Journey, you dont mark progress if you score a hit. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerRoad 98 99}} {{#rollTotal() revealADangerRoad 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. If they are the same result, double its effect. {{/rollTotal() revealADangerRoad 100}}
    {{/revealADangerRoad}} {{#revealADangerEncounter}}
    {{revealADangerEncounter}}
    {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 1 13}} You converge with one or multiple travelers or denizens in this area, facing off. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 1 13}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 14 26}} One or multiple unaware travelers or denizens are guarding this area, either laid in wait, patrolling or working. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 14 26}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 27 39}} You're ambushed, or attacked without warning. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 27 39}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 40 51}} Your presence has caught the attention of one or multiple travelers or denizens in the area. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 40 51}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 52 63}} Your arrival to this area has been expected. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 52 63}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 64 75}} You sense one or multiple presences lurking or stalking. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 64 75}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 76 85}} One or multiple unaware travelers or denizens are blocking or undermining the path in some way. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 76 85}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 86 93}} You find one or multiple travelers or denizens in unfavorable circumstances. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 86 93}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 94 98}} You find one or multiple travelers or denizens pets or underlings. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 94 98}} {{#rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 99 100}} Roll twice more on this table, and use one result. {{/rollBetween() revealADangerEncounter 99 100}}
    {{/revealADangerEncounter}} {{#findAnOpportunityCategory}}
    {{findAnOpportunityCategory}}
    {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 1 55}} Favorable Area. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 1 55}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 56 80}} Benign Character Encounter. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 56 80}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 81 100}} Item Finding {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCategory 81 100}}
    {{/findAnOpportunityCategory}} {{#findAnOpportunityArea}}
    {{findAnOpportunityArea}}
    {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 1 11}} The travel took shorter than expected. Take +1 momentum. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 1 11}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 12 20}} Elements of this area can be used to leverage your travel. If you Undertake a Journey, you may reroll any dice. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 12 20}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 21 28}} There is a path that seems to lead towards your destination. If you follow it, add +2 when you Undertake a Journey. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 21 28}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 29 35}} The travel has cleared your mind. If you Hearten, reroll any dice. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 29 35}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 36 42}} This seems to be an ideal place to find a moment of peace. If you Hearten, add +2. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 36 42}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 43 49}} This seems to be an ideal place to bolster your reserves. If you Resupply, add +2. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 43 49}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 50 55}} This seems to be a place safe enough to rest and recover for several hours. If you Make Camp, add +2. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 50 55}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 56 61}} You find a healthy settlement. If you Sojourn, add +1. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 56 61}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 62 66}} This area offers a captivating ambience or comfortable environment. If you Hearten, take +1 spirit on a hit. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 62 66}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 67 71}} This area offers enough to bolster your reserves if you dedicate enough to it. If you Resupply and score hit, you may suffer -1 momentum in exchange for +1 supply. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 67 71}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 72 76}} This waypoint offers more than needed for a modest rest. If you Make Camp, and score a hit, you may choose an extra option. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 72 76}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 77 80}} You seem to be closer to your destination than expected. Mark an additional progress in your journey track. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 77 80}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 81 83}} This area offers just what you need to camp. If you Make Camp, you may reroll any dice. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 81 83}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 84 86}} You reach this waypoint just at an opportune time to bolster your reserves. If you Resupply now, you may reroll any dice. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 84 86}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 87 88}} There is a hidden passage that could be a shortcut. If you Reach Your Destination, you may reroll any dice. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 87 88}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 89 96}} You reach a location of interest related to one of your quests or that might lead to one. Take +2 momentum. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 89 96}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 97 98}} Choose one result from this table. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 97 98}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 99 100}} Roll twice more on this table. Both results occur. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityArea 99 100}}
    {{/findAnOpportunityArea}} {{#findAnOpportunityCharacter}}
    {{findAnOpportunityCharacter}}
    {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 1 16}} You encounter a traveler or denizen who might provide you guide in exchange for something of value. If you agree, suffer -1 wealth or -2 supply (your choice) in exchange for adding +3 next time you Undertake a Journey for this travel. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 1 16}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 17 30}} You encounter a traveler or denizen willing to provide you guide and supply. If he does, add +1 next time you Undertake a Journey for this travel and take +1 supply. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 17 30}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 31 38}} You encounter a traveler or denizen who might provide you health care in exchange for something of value. If you agree, suffer -1 wealth or -2 supply (your choice) in exchange for making the Hearten move now and add +3. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 31 38}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 39 46}} You encounter a traveler or denizen who might rise your spirit in exchange for something of value. If you agree, suffer -1 wealth or -2 supply (your choice) in exchange for making the Heal move now and add +3. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 39 46}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 47 53}} You encounter a traveler or denizen willing to rise your spirit. If he does, Hearten now and add +2. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 47 53}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 54 60}} You encounter a traveler or denizen willing to give you first aid. If he does, Heal now and add +2. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 54 60}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 61 70}} You encounter a provision trader. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 61 70}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 71 75}} You encounter an equipment trader. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 71 75}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 76 79}} You encounter a traveler or denizen with the potential of being a conditional companion with the goal of serving as hireling and the drive of getting wealth. If you Take a Conditional Companion, add +1. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 76 79}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 80 83}} You encounter a traveler or denizen with the potential of being a conditional companion. Take +1 momentum. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 80 83}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 84 86}} You encounter one or more travelers or denizens in need for help and with the means to reward you. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 84 86}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 87 95}} You encounter one or more characters related to one of you quests or that might lead to one. Take +2 momentum. {{/rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 87 95}} {{#rollBetween() findAnOpportunityCharacter 96 98}} Roll twice more on this table.     {{/ManifestInsanityCategory}} {{#ManifestInsanityShort}}
    {{ManifestInsanityShort}}
    {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 1 28}} You get scared, and your next move should imply to flee as far as possible from the source of the fear or danger. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 1 28}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 29 51}} Your spirit is overwhelmed. Take the dazed condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 29 51}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 52 69}} You show hysteric and emotional outburst by screaming, laughing, crying. Every other ally and companion must Endure Stress (1d2 stress) as a result. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 52 69}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 70 87}} You begin babbling, coherently (logorrhoea) or incoherently. Your words show abuse, fear, hopelessness, irrationality or selfishness. Every other ally and companion must Endure Stress (1d3 stress) as a result. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 70 87}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 88 95}} You Inflict Harm on yourself. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 88 95}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 96 100}} You faint. Take the unconscious condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityShort 96 100}}
    {{/ManifestInsanityShort}} {{#ManifestInsanityLong}}
    {{ManifestInsanityLong}}
    {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 1 15}} Take the phobiac (severity 4) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 1 15}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 16 29}} Take the attached (severity 4) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 16 29}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 30 36}} Take the hallucinating (severity 2) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 30 36}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 37 53}} Take the compulsed (severity 4) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 37 53}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 54 57}} You start suffering psychosomatic deafness. Take the deafened (severity +1) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 54 57}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 58 60}} You start suffering psychosomatic blindness. Take the blind (severity +1) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 58 60}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 61 73}} Take the mute condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 61 73}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 74 85}} You retreat into your mind, in a stupor state, assuming fetal position if not immediate danger is around, oblivious to events around you. Take the dazed, mute, shaken and unsteady (shaky) conditions. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 74 85}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 86 93}} You become catatonic. Take the dazed, mute and numb (severity +1) conditions. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 86 93}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 94 98}} Take the amok (severity 3) condition. Then, Clash the nearest target, whether they are an ally, companion, foe or else. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 94 98}} {{#rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 99 00}} Take the amnesiac (severity 5) condition. {{/rollBetween() ManifestInsanityLong 99 00}}

    {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}}The harm is mortal. Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}}You are dying. You need to Heal within an hour or two, or Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 11 20}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to a foe not inclined to show mercy, Face Death.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 21 35}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}} You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity (such as running or fighting) before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 36 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}}You are battered but still standing.{{/rollBetween() endureHarm 51 100}}

    {{#rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}}You are overwhelmed. Face Desolation.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 1 10}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}}You give up. If this is a companion, Test Their Loyalty.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 11 25}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}}You give in to a fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts. Manifest Insanity.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 26 50}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 51 80}}You persevere.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 51 80}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 81 85}}You get a moment of clarity in the eye of the storm. If you have the shaken condition card, discard it. Take +4 spirit and +8 momentum. Then, add +2 to your next move.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 81 85}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 86 90}}You get virtuous in the face of chaos. If you have the shaken condition card, discard it. Then, take +4 spirit and draw up to your maximum of resilience cards.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 86 90}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 91 95}}Your body harvest vigor. If you have the shaken condition card, discard it. Then, take +4 spirit and +1d12 health.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 91 95}} {{#rollBetween() endureStress 96 100}}Your spirit shines brightest against a backdrop of desolation. If you have the shaken condition card, discard it. Then, take +8 spirit.{{/rollBetween() endureStress 96 100}}
